content.detailedDescription: While driving from bay city, mi to caro, mi traveling east on gilford rd just east of reese rd and near s. vanburen rd. i witnessed a light to the southeast of me that was blue then green then yellow then red it cycled like that 3 times and when i got directly beside it to i saw whatever it was flash bright blue and orange and yellow sparks trailed the object the blue and the spark trail hung in the air for a few seconds then faded away. it moved very fast and was gone in an instant
content.summary: Witnessd a hovering light changeing colors then a bright blue flash and a fire trail

content.detailedDescription:
Waiting for 8:30 bus to truro (back to our condo at a place called sand castle) along with roughly 30 tourists, primarily.  had movie camera in hand.  little boy asked his father what it was he was looking at in the sky, toward p-town's historic pilgrim tower, perhaps 500 yards away, and appearing to be floating next to the tower, an extremely bright, light blue light.  though the illusion was that the object was close to the tower, i believe it was probably 1/4 of a mile out over race point and the ocean (near the absolute tip of the cape.

everyone in sight was  visually locked onto the object....Guessing what it was...Copter, blimp, kite, drone, etc....Where it was or seemed to be,  it was none of those things.  that was quite clear to every adult i spoke with over the few minute we watched.  i took a still of the event, one linute or two long video, and a couple of other seconds long clips.

the bus driver stated that we should all get on the bus because he was leaving.  i tried to film one more time out the window, but the object moved quickly off toward the wsw and was gone.  we went back to the condos and the adults stood in the parking lot scanning the sky for one more look (no dice) and anylizing our collective experience.  one party suggested we were all fooled by someone.  a couple of others thought we had seen a copter....The silent kind.  the majority thought that we had all seen a ufo, and i agreed.

we have come to provincetown to our timeshare for many years, as have many of the other observers.  most had never seen anything like it before, though i had...In vermont years ago. i checked the paper each day, but heard nothing.  nobody reported it, i believe because we were all "tourists" for lack of a better reference.

i too at first thought i was seeing a copter, but i know how far away you can hear them, how they move , where they might and might not be.  i pretty quickly, along with many others, thought i was looking at a ufo.  i have shown many other coworkers and friends the brief film and, given the way the thing moves, most agree that it is not identifiable.

i will e the clip separately as i know no other way to do it.
content.summary: Standing near commercial st. in provincetown waiting for bus to truro. looked up toward pilgrim tower in town and noted bright blue light hovering with little lateral movement  visually close to tower, but clearly a sig. distance out over the ocean .

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: need some one to write it for me my writing is not good,
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Cant explain because my englis

content.detailedDescription:
Riding in an suv, going west on rte 45 between rte 15 and bull run crossing in lewisburg, pa, i noticed three large, bright, orange lights in a triangular formation moving across the sky.  they seemed kind of low in the sky to my initial view.   i had heard of the large, delta-shaped craft that has been reported by many people, and wondered if this could be it.  never having seen anything like it, i asked the driver to pull over quickly so we could see what it was.  we pulled over and parked in a lot, and got out to observe.  it became clear that there were three separate craft (since we could see the sky and stars between them).

each craft had a bright orange (not amber - clearly orange) light at its front.  the light on each was sweeping side to side (not downward) as the craft moved forward.  we could not see the size of each craft, since only the orange light was visible on each - no other colors, lights, or reflections.  the craft made no sounds.  the craft did not stay in the same exact triangular formation (but did stay in triangular relationship to one another) as they moved over us, from ne to sw.

a minute or two later, two more craft of the exact same description were seen; same characteristics, same sweeping light, same directions.

i tried to observe through small binoculars, but they provided no further detail.  one of us had a camera and took a few photos - not sure yet how they came out.

one of us is ex-military (navy seal, vietnam era).  we were all excited and very curious about what we were seeing.  i wondered why the craft had no other lights besides the one described above; i wondered if they could be searching the sky for some other craft; i wondered, since they were silent, if they could be some kind of stealth military craft.

we lost sight of the objects as they moved sw, out of our field of vision.
content.summary: Observed 3 ufos in triangular formation followed a few minutes later by two more. all had only bright orange front light strobing side-to-side.  all were somewhat slow-moving and silent.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard letting the dog out.  i was listening to the local football game in the distance when i saw a light that seemed odd to me.  i stared at it for about 5 minutes before i realized it was not a star or aircraft(jet or helicopter). it was hovering flashing orange white blue yellow and red. it was very bright in the north-ne just hovering and after about ten minutes it started moving what looked like east. i lost it after it moved behind the trees in the distance and i came in the house to write this.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo.....Blue green red white orange flashing lights........North-north east of berlin,wi........In the direction of appleton moving east-maybe south east.......Hovered for about15-20 min then started moving slowly.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside looking up at the stars when i saw a light traveling se at a slow rate (compared to a shooting star), it was smaller than the stars and not extremely bright (which made me feel it was further than the stars i had been examining) it did not flash and there were no red or green lights flashing. it went slowly across the sky and i had to keep blinking to keep track of it. i watched closely because it looked as if it were going to hit a star and then it veered and the was gone. a few minutes later i saw an airplane (flashing red and green lights going north). i found this website when i googled to see if all airplanes have flashing colored lights or had to have flashing lights period because this did not flash. this is probably nothing but i thought i would share.
content.summary: Bright light going across sky...Seemed to be further than some stars

content.detailedDescription:
Sightings report in good nesto sightings report now in sightings report now  flyings report in sightings  bat faster ovetr landings 4:67pm 
wen flyings repport now sightings report now sightings report now goood  or not  verey  in porta  ufo sightings
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Les report now bat sightings

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside looking at the stars when i looked northwest i seen a white glow which grew in size ( small like a pin head they like a dime size ) then just disappeared. it was like seeing a white fireworks burst and how they grow but without any sparks or falling debris. no fade out just gone.
content.summary: Object grew from small to a larger size then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Me and one of my friends were walking down to this we use to throw rocks and tree branches down it. i was just looking up at the shy and saw something flying it got my attention because of how big it is there aren't any air ports in my town. i tried to figure out what it was but i had no idea what it was it had no visible motor wings or propellers to support flight and it was up high enough that it wasn't a remote controlled toy and it was in the air for at least two three minutes before me and my buddy lost sight of it. it was cream sickle orange rectangle with what looked like a bubble or force field around it it was flying in a straight path. it made me feel a little uneasy i din't know what it was or what was gona happen next. i really wanted to snap a picture of it but it was to high up in the air for 2.0 mega pixel camera i had at the time on my phone
content.summary: I saw an odd cream sickle orange object in the air that was rectangular in shape. whit what looked similar to a bubble or force field around it

content.detailedDescription: 05/12/10 around 0845pm...Driving in central il, followed by wife in separate vehicle...Dark country hwy with no oncoming traffic- nothing unusual as i was driving on a curvy stretch of hwy until suddenly i did not feel in control of my vehicle, didn't feel as if i was still in vehicle, tried to tap the brakes and felt as if i was somehow hovering - could not reach the pedals...Tried to steer my f150 into the ditch to avoid any potential accident but could not affect the steering wheel...Uncertain of amount of time lapse but suddenly all was back to normal....Could see that my wife was still following in her car. when i arrived home and parked my wife pulled in behind me and jumped out of her car very startled....The same thing happened to her in the same area (i wasn't going to say anything to her - i thought i might have had a stoke or something) as we were comparing our experience (in driveway, me facing east and her west)i saw a bright white round object above our barn to the east in the distance....I took off running towards it, when my wife turned around to see where i was going it suddenly vanished, appeared to have dropped below barn roofline.....Anyone else experience anything similar?
content.summary: Saw a bright object that rapidly disappeared after a strange experince while driving

content.detailedDescription: Me and two of my sons were traveling west on 619 when we saw the large white ball of light.  we then headed south on freshly toward the wal-mart on state street and used the phone to video it.  we drove into the parking lot between jc penny and the dollar store and just watched it.  it didn't seem to be moving, and we couldn't tell if it had been moving or just been stationary the whole time because we were moving in the car? there were 3 cars pulled over to the side on freshly when we were headed toward state street and the people seemed to be pulled over looking at the same thing we were.
content.summary: Large ball of light over alliance near the wal-mart

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving work, and looked int to the dusk night sky and observed what looked like a shooting star, it was very brief. it was at this point i noticed a very bright light in the sky. it looked almost like an airplane with it's landing lights on except there were no coloured flashing indicator lights, just this very bright light.
it was moving very slowly from the eastern sky and moving in a nwn direction. my next thought was it is a satellite, but it was far to bright, large and moving in the wrong direction.
i watch this object for app. 5 min. the light never changed in intensity, but it did speed up and then just faded away. 
a couple of points.
1 this all took place in the in the eastern sky, had this been a satellite in low orbit. i would have been able to follow it across the to the northern sky. this did not happen. it faded away while still in the eastern sky.
2 traveling in a nwn direction, this object should have been dim and gained in intensity as it traveled closer to the setting sun, but it did just the opposite. 
3. i have not observed ( could be wrong about this) or know of a satellite that travels in a nwn direct. 
either way a very cool experience, i'll be looking in the night sky again tonight, if i see the same thing at the a=same time, then it is most likely just a satellite.
content.summary: Bright light in sky.

content.detailedDescription: I always look up the sky, everyday ,1 to 2 hours during the night. i know the stars and how an airplane looks like in the dark. well, i was sleeping in my bedroom, with the window open. i always look up the sky when i woke up in the midle of the night. this happened around 4:45 am 9/27/13; so, 5 to 8 minutes after i woke up i saw this super bright light, and i said to myself "i've never seen that star,it is so bright and big". i dindt want to believe what i was seeing, that was not an airplane or something like that, there was no sound of anything... the only thing i could hear was the crickets... i didnt know what it was. then i saw, it was moving! and at this moment i got scared. it was flying slowly (10-20mph), it kept coming closer, brighter and brighter... i stare at it for like 3 minutes until it passed over my head. as it was passing over, i could see this huuuge.... black... triangle... no sound ,flying slowly over my head; then i couldnt see more because it went over my building. i never , ever in my life had seen such thing like that, ever. and i didnt want to see stuff like that, i dont like it.. i was so scared, i got in bed, under my blanket.. , i text to a friend for like 5 min, then my phone dindt have signal.. idk if that "thing" flying over had something to do.
content.summary: Huge black triangle, big bright light,object flying slowly

content.detailedDescription: I was about 6 years old and i know this sounds crazy, but i was in my front yard in the late 80's early 90's, i remember running down my drive way and the it felt as if time had slowed downed, i remember looking up at a triangular air craft. i thought it was a floating city, hell i dont know what to think of it, my experience was short yet it felt like a long time. the craft hovered 50 to 100 feet above me, i thought that the tree next to me would of been shaking or at least the leaves moving but nothing. there were 3 lights and they seemed to be placed at each point of the triangle. although there was no sound it did seem to have a hum or aura around it. i am writing this because i saw an episode of of a bucks county woman who saw something similar and a man from florida who may have saw this same craft around the same time i did in 1991, i'm not sure of the date, i was to young but the time seems about right. i was just wondering if anyone around this time frame saw what i saw.
content.summary: Large triangula shaped floating city

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from a convenient store with my coffee...I noticed a beautiful sunrise as i turned onto my street....Then i noticed something in the sky below the cloud cover so i knew it was not a star. i also knew it was not an airplane of any sort as it was hovering in one spot. i pulled into my driveway, got out of my car with my iphone to take a photo. it was still hovering in one spot. i took a photo of it and watched it for about another minute. suddenly it streaked across the sky northbound and disappeared from my view. judging the distance it was a way from me, which was probably a few miles.....I am quite sure it jetted away at thousands of mph. when i first observed the object i thought it might have been a balloon or something....Then i felt strangely about the object. after it had jetted away i felt a little excited and a little scared.  i had never really believed in ufo hype before. now i believe our technology has increased by leaps and bounds or there are extraterrestrials.
content.summary: Hovered for about 2 minutes then abruptly like a bullet headed north

content.detailedDescription: While in our field doing a camp out with our 3 girls, they went to bed about 12:30 am in the tent , my wife and i sat by the fire talking and having  some coffee(as we dont drink and and dont smoke anddo any drugs what so ever) we both got up from our chairs to start to clean up the camp sight and as we were talking we both notice at the same time a very bright light came from the north  just over the trees and we both thought this was very strange as it just made a hum sound but not one that was very loud and it was moving very slow just over our heads  and we both held each others hands and was moving back wards away from under this object and it did not slow down and was very bright and just went south just over the hwy and into the hills and went over them and shot to the left and was gone that fast. we both just stood there kinda in disbelief and shook up and we were not tired  for the rest of the night till day light came then we got the place cleand up and drove to our homw which is less then 100 yards from the camp sight.
content.summary: We saw a bight light comming at us from just above the trees while in our field.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the back porch watching the sky because 48 hours earlier i seen a huge boomerang shaped ufo fly over from the north to the south at incredible speed. i reported it to mufon and filled out a report. after that sighting i was informed that there has been a rash of sighting around denver and colorado. so i planned on staying up this night to see if i could see this object again, to confirm to my self i wasn't nuts i guess. my back porch faces the west and can see straight up 90 degrees, north and south vary well. so i set down in a chair that was facing north, my head laid back looking straight up, so i could see up, westernly and north vary well. i was a good coverage of view. i was clear and star's were shining. i was vary nice out. i seen a few meteor's go by, that passed the time well. at 1:05 am i was staring straight up and there is was again, the same craft from 48 hours earlier, and this time i was ready. huge, boomerang shaped, looked like around eight lights on the leading edge, but faint like the other one. all white, no marker light like a airplane has, red and green. only white but faint. holding my fist out it was as wide as my fist and arms length and moving extremely fast from south to north heading right over denver. because i was out to see if it came again like before, i could make out more of it. i could see a black shape this time kinda like the b-2 stealth bomber but over 10 times the size. and not a sound. and it was nearly straight over head. i can hear commercial jets fly over at 30,000 feet and hear them but not a sound from this craft. by judging the altitude by the lights and outline she was up quite a few thousand feet, over 5000 it would seem. but moving that fast and out of sight with in probably 4 seconds, it should have been over the sound  barrier, and again, no sound. i lost site as it moved towards downtown. well i know i'm not nuts now. twice in 48 hours i seen the same craft.. after all these years i finally know, we are not alone. i know this and would swear by this fact now.
content.summary: Boomerang shaped craft moving from south to north over denver

content.detailedDescription: Walking dog around 2 a_m booked up in the sky install a light from far away as i got closer only saw 3 lights from under had came by very quietly not going very fast i say about 40 miles an hour cruise over our heads i stared up no noise no nothing headed towards the oceani have seen two others in the past and they were in north georgia but we're much larger and only saw them from the interstate and disappeared behind mountain ranges this one flew right over had three lights and was black
content.summary: Black triangle 3 lights completely silent right over head have seen two before but this one was smaller.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to go to the store up the street. approaching my vehicle i immediately noticed movement above the treeline to the west. there was still some light from the sun but not much. it looked like an enormous cloud of dim fireflies or charged particles"blooming". went back into house and told wife and son to take a look, both saw the same when we went out to the yard. aurora is not uncommon here, but i've seen it enough to know what it looks like. this was hundreds of many small light sources that was sustained, unlike fireworks which fade. i have never seen anything like it!
content.summary: Looked like fireflies or charged particles "flowering or blooming" above the treeline

content.detailedDescription:
Orange reddish ball was seen gliding from southeast to northwest. smooth motion without any strange movement. stayed in single path. moving in one direction in fairly slow to moderate pace but bit faster than the satellite would be. display strong glare yet continue to shine brilliantly. toward to ending of its trajectory, it dimmed and appears to blinks out before completely disappears without any sign or trace of its existence or flight path. 

i can confirm it is not asteroid or satellite or plane or even meteorite breaking into our atmosphere. it was static object moving in what seem to be predetermined flight path. i couldn't see when it appears first as the tree was blocking my view, however, i was able to recognize it as unusual object before moving into clearing and had direct view of the glowing orange reddish sphere/ball. the sky condition was extreme clear and crisp, this occurred at my backyard where i was able to observe the night sky pretty regular and i am familiar with frequent flight paths, although, this object had caught me off guard with bizzare light and traveling in a path where the planes and satellite never comes across. i've also witnessed an asteroid breaking up in an entry and saw it breaks into smaller pieces and what i observed tonight was nothing like it. 

before this sighting, when i first came outside during 2340-2345h on 26th, to enjoy the nice stargazing weather, i immediately recognized orange reddish streak escaped my view before i was able to identify it. i believe it was the same object which i observed later in the hour.
content.summary: Orange reddish sphere moves in single direction and blinked out

content.detailedDescription: I let the dogs out at approxamately 11:10 pm. i was standing in the driveway. i did glance up and saw a group of lights to the south. they were heading to the se. there was no particular formation. i was waiting for a sound because i live near camp lejeune and new river air station. there was no sound. there were no aircraft prior to or afterwards. some of the lights went to the north and some went to the south, while some continued on the same se path.I lost sight of them beyond the trees. i was curious and thought it was odd due to the lack of noise due to the speed they were moving. i looked and listened for a few minutes, but saw nothing else. i called the dogs in.
content.summary: Looking to the south and saw multiple lights at high speed. some lights went to north and some went south. rest of lights stayed on original course.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to go to the store up the street. approaching my vehicle i immediately noticed movement above the treeline to the west. there was still some light from the sun but not much. it looked like an enormous cloud of dim fireflies or charged particles"blooming". went back into house and told wife and son to take a look, both saw the same when we went out to the yard. aurora is not uncommon here, but i've seen it enough to know what it looks like. this was hundreds of many small light sources that was sustained, unlike fireworks which fade. i have never seen anything like it!
content.summary: Looked like fireflies or charged particles "flowering or blooming" above the treeline

content.detailedDescription: While traveling eb on a rural road in upstate ny in the fall of 1970 i observed something coming at me ( wb) just above the power lines ( about 60 ft) my wife and my 2 1/2 y/o son were with me. as i slowed down and pulled of to the shoulder, the ufo was in front of me but going only about 15 mph in the opposite direction (wb) i stepped out of the car and observed a rust colored, flying wing shape ( or boomerang) craft just above the power lines ( about 50 ft )  it had lights but i do not recall what color or how many. my wife was now yelling at me to get back in the car.  i did not.  i watched as it passed over  emitting no sound.  as i turned  to look at it going wb, it disappeard in about 1 second emitting no sound whatsoever and was gone in " blink of an eye' .  i should have reported in in 1970 but back then it would have been ridiculed.  i am much wiser now and truly believe in ufo's.  there is just too much evidence to just look the other way. thank you for your time.  rr butler
content.summary: Appeared slightly over the power lines.  rust colored,boomerang shaped,ribs apparent,disappeared w/b with no sound. about 40 ft  wingspan.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at home, then i was on the phone with my wife and noticed a round orange sphere. i never saw it before.  suddenly as i took out my binoculars to see it, it slowly vanished! then about 3 minutes later it came back but this time it was red. the sky was clear, it seemed to have a long point on the end opposite of the light. now as i am typing this it has disappeared again!!! there are now to planes flying around the spot where it was last at!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange then red sphere hovered/dissapeared reapeard then moved direction

content.detailedDescription:
Green / orange flash of light streaked across the sky. west to east direction just above treetops. my daughter saw the light streak across the sky in front of them while driving. she did not say anything until her boyfriend said, "what the hell was that?" the flash was was only a second, they both saw a different colored light, one said green while the other thought it was orange.
observed flash of light at intersection of w. pine st and main st, plaistow, nh
content.summary: Green / orange flashed across sky just above treetops east to west direction

content.detailedDescription: Upon coming home from a meeting, i pulled the car into the garage. my wife let our dog out. as he was doing his "duty" i was watching the sky. after less than 5 minutes, i saw a meteor from n to s. after another 2 to 3 minutes, i saw what appeared to be 8-10 triangles flying as though connected. they reminded me of a reticulated plastic toy snake, slightly weaving through the sky. the entire event lasted possibly 20 seconds. they were silent, dark red, and were flying faster than a satellite or an airplane would normally fly across the sky. the entire "string" of objects were significantly longer than an airplane. they had no flashing lights. the object(s) faded from view as it headed farther to the horizon.
content.summary: Appeared like a plastic toy reticulated snake

content.detailedDescription:
September 26 2013 7:25pm the bright light is back again.
same pattern as i reported to mufon case # 51067
tonight the object hovered for about an hour then started moving west.  i'm surprised that nobody else has noticed the bright star-like object in the sky.
i first noticed the light sept 23rd 2013 and again on the 24th 25th and im sure ill see it again tomorrow. 
if you live in the area of eglinton ave and markham rd look up in the sky tomorrow night around 7:30pm just before dark above the metro grocery store at the corner.
who knows it might be there, it's one thing to see something once but to see it four times on four different days is strange.
content.summary: 4 night event bright light

content.detailedDescription: I worked on the lookout tower in southern oregon. another lookout named george brown called me on the radio and told me to look in a specific direction and to tell him what i saw. the object looked like a ball bearing reflecting the light.  if i remember right it was 10 to 15 miles away and looked about the size of your little fingernail. i watched it off and on for about two hours. i turned. my back and when i looked again it was gone. i was very curious but only george and i know about it because people would make fun of us. i know it was not a balloon horribly. it was in the middle of a deep forest at approximately 1 to 2000 feet in elevation. i have believed every since then.
content.summary: I worked for the forest service, on lookout. i watch the object for about two hours then it disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I live on a lake.  couldn't sleep.  went out on balcony and saw flash of white light come from behind and over the house and across the lake and then hover and then went over the hill beyond the lake and descended behind the hill.  when it hovered, i noticed two bands of white lights moving sequentially and a band of amber (copper) and green alternating light inbetween the two white bands that was pulsating.  the colored lights were pulsating at a slower speed than the two bands of white light.   on other occasions, my husband and i noticed an orange glow from behind the hill (there are no homes there). it was clearly not an airplane or helicopter.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 rows of bright light hovering and go to south and descending behind hill

content.detailedDescription:
Wednesday,september 25,2013,at 7:30 p.M.,i noticed a bright object,circular,with what appeared to be spokes in the middle,covered with very bright yellow lights,both on the rim,and on the spokes.(under the spokes,the craft appeared to be solid).
the object was very visible,and very bright in the dark night sky.It was hovering when i first observed it.
i then opened my screen door,and leaned out for a better look.
at this point,it suddenly began to move,and still silent,moved in a straight line high above a row of trees,after which i could no longer see it.(as it flew silently away,it tipped a little to one side).

it was a littlefrighteing because,it hovered until i opened the door,and leaned out,then began to move.I had the feeling i was being watched.                 
i first noticed the object while in my living room.I caught a glimpse of it
out my back door,and realized this wasn't a normal celestial body.
content.summary: Obsrved ufo from my back deck.Circular,with bright yellow lights.Hovering.Opened door to better observe object.It then immediately began to move,gliding still silently across the sky,and out of my view.
